text:
I'm having feels too, @drvox. Mostly abandonment. I mean, almost 100k tweets together and just...adios?

Sincerely,
Your Old Twitter Handle
author: drgrist

text: Don't worry @DrVox. You can have this handle back if you want. (although I think a parody account would be interesting)
author: drgrist

text:
Dear @DrVox,

How could you leave me?

Sincerely,
Your Old Twitter Handle
author: drgrist
